general.title: Network Congestion Alert
general.message: Network congestion is currently low. This is an optimal time for mining with potentially higher rewards.

general.message: Block production has increased by 15% in the last 24 hours, indicating growing network activity.

general.message: A new X1 Mobile Miner firmware update is available. Updating is recommended for improved security and performance.

general.title: Reward Calculation
general.message: The network's reward algorithm has been optimized. Miners with higher uptime will see increased rewards.

general.title: Network Health
general.message: The BlockDAG network is operating at optimal health with 99.98% uptime over the past week.
